Docs.summary: Defines the event that contains information about Web service errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebServiceErrorEvent> event is raised if an error occurs during a Web service request. Your application can use this event to obtain request-related information, which is available by using the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation> and the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation> classes.
